content.title: Motorola 1518 Surveillance Headset with PTT Mic, Black, White
content.description: The Motorola Surveillance Headset with Push-To-Talk microphone is great for covert or stealth missions, allowing discreet operation of most Motorola Talkabout Two-Way Radios. A clear earpiece and coiled cord provides a snug, comfortable fit - even under a motorcycle helmet - and reduces device visibility while hunting, attending a theme park or coordinating a wedding. The 1518 Surveillance Headset delivers crisp, clear sound even in noisy places. The cord length between microphone and earpiece provides flexibility for movement. The PTT microphone can easily attach to your clothing with an accompanying clip. The Motorola Surveillance Headset with PTT Microphone is single-pronged and works with all Motorola Talk about FRS/GMRS radios capable of using a headset. No set up is needed, just plug into your two-way radios and enjoy.

content.title: Arvok 13 13.3 14 Inch Laptop Sleeve Case for MacBook Pro 14 2021/Water-Resistant Notebook Chromebook Computer Pocket Briefcase Carrying Bag Pouch Skin Cover for HP/Dell/Lenovo/Asus/Acer, Wine Red
content.description: About this item                   Compatible Devices: Suitable for MacBook Pro 14 2021/ MacBook Air 2017. Ideal fit for most 13"-14" laptops for ACER, APPLE, ASUS, DELL, HP, LENOVO, SONY, SAMSUNG, TOSHIBA and more. Proper fitment varies according to the size of the devices. Please check the dimensions of your device before purchasing. Interior Dimensions: 13.5" x 0.78" x 9.5"/34.3 x 2 x 24.1 cm (L x W x H).     Superior Protection: Premium thickened water-resistant neoprene material offers a ultra slim lightweight design and superior protection to protect laptop/notebook from dust, shocks, bumps, scratches, scuffs and spills. (Thickness: 0.25 inch/0.6 cm)     Ultra-Slim & Lightweight: Easily sliding into your briefcase, backpack or other luggage bags, which make it so convenient for daily use and traveling wherever you go.     Convenient Use: Quick top-loading zipper on the bag glides smoothly, allowing for an easy and convenient access to your laptop computer.     Lifetime Support: Full 12 months Worry-Free warranty with lifetime support! 24/7/365 customer service support, just purchase and enjoy this superior product with confidence and risk-free!

content.title: CaseBot Case for Lenovo Tab M10 Plus 10.3" (Not for M10 Plus Gen 3rd 10.6" 2022), Lightweight Slim Shell Stand Cover for Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (2020 2nd Gen) TB-X606F/TB-X606X 10.3" FHD Tablet
content.description: About this item                   Exclusively designed for Lenovo Tab M10 Plus TB-X606F / TB-X606X 10.3 Inch FHD (2020 2nd Gen) Android Tablet. Not fit for Lenovo Tab M10 Plus Gen 3rd 10.6" 2022 release.     Easy clip-on application. Precise cut-outs and openings for easy access to all tablet features.     This is a one piece case, the front and back does not separate. Cover has flip capability to transform the case into a viewing stand and keyboard stand.     Slim lightweight durable protective hardback with premium quality PU leather. Soft scratch-free microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection.     Available in a variety of bright and fun colors.

content.title: Lenovo Tab M8 Folio Case, Polycarbonate and Microfiber Material, Polyurethane Protective Film, ZG38C02862, Black
content.description: Protect your Tab M8 from accidental drops, scuffs, and other damage with the Lenovo Tab M8 Folio Case. This convenient fitted case is made with a combination of microfiber and polycarbonate material to keep your tablet safe and secure â€“ and looking great. Also designed to be used as a tablet stand, this tablet case lets you watch videos in the most comfortable position! In addition to the sturdy carrying case, the Tab 8 Folio tablet cover comes with a protective film to guard the screen against scratches. Sleek, slim, and modern, the Tab M8 Folio Case allows you to carry your tablet with pride.

content.title: Lenovo Yoga Laptop Sleeve 14 Inch Notebook/Tablet Compatible with MacBook Air/Pro - Slim Eco-Friendly Lightweight Case with Accessory Pocket & Magnetic Closure - Teal
content.description: Made from PET recycled materials, the sleeve not only provides a perfect fit but also takes us one step closer to our environmental aspirations. Sporting a dedicated laptop compartment and accessory pockets sealed by a magnetic flap to keep your devices and accessories safe.

content.title: Lenovo 45W Computer Charger - Round Tip AC Wall Adapter (GX20K11838), Black, Lenovo 45W AC Wall Adapter (Round Tip)
content.description: Get power when and where you need it. Keep one in the office, one at home, and another in your carrying case for convenient access to power. Just plug it into an available outlet to deliver AC power to the compatible Lenovo NBs listed below and to recharge the system battery. Lenovo AC adapters are compact, energy efficient and backed by a 1 year warranty.

content.name: Other Accessories
content.description: Enhance your Lenovo device with the best accessories.

content.title: iOttie iTap 2 Magnetic Air Vent Car Mount Holder, Cradle for Samsung Galaxy S22, Google Pixel 7, Motorola Moto G, OnePlus 10, Sony Xperia & Other Android Smartphones & Other Smartphones
content.description: The Tap Magnetic 2 Air Vent Mount is a sleek and compact magnetic mounting solution that holds your Android smartphone securely while you drive. Designed for maximum convenience, the iTap 2 features two rare-earth magnets that provide a strong hold for all Android smartphone and case combinations. The included metal plate kit features one small and one large metal plate as wells a protective film that attaches directly on the back of your Android phone or case, and does not interfere with wireless charging when positioned correctly. Install the iTap Magnetic 2 on almost any vehicle air vent using the twist lock that tightens securely onto most vent blades. Enhance your driving experience with the iTap Magnetic 2 air vent mount from iOttie!

content.title: Lenovo Laptop Bag T210, Messenger Shoulder Bag for Laptop or Tablet, Sleek, Durable & Water-Repellent Fabric
content.description: The Lenovo 15.6" r T210 seamlessly blends style and functionality. Its water-repellent fabric, optimal laptop protection, spacious storage, thoughtful organization, and travel-friendly design make it a versatile accessory for the modern individual. Whether you're headed to the office, a cafÃ©, or a business trip, this sleek laptop bag ensures you're well-prepared and looking stylish. Dimensions: Fits Up To (L x D x H): 362 x 22 x 250 mm (14.2 x 0.8 x 9.8 in) Weight: 0.465kg
